price: They said, “This is what your Lord said. Indeed, He is the All-Wise, the All-Knowing.”
arabic: قَالُواْ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
